name: Bank Documents OCR - INDIA

api_list.name: BankDocumentsOcr
api_list.description: OCR - Upload Bank Cheque or Passbook and Fetch Bank Details like Bank Name, Account Number, IFSC CODE, MICR, Branch, Bank Address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bank-documents-ocr-india.p.rapidapi.com/BankDocumentsOcr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bank-documents-ocr-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
